snippet: Despite homelessness and an injury, Amina Gilmore, 24, a full-time culinary student and the mother of a 2-year-old, has kept her eyes on the goal of opening a cooking school.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, beneficiary of the New York Times Neediest Cases fund, helps Amina Gilmore pay for bus fare to school.
lead_paragraph: Despite homelessness and an injury, Amina Gilmore, 24, a full-time culinary student and the mother of a 2-year-old, has kept her eyes on the goal of opening a cooking school.

headline.main: Seeking Her Own Stove, With Hopes of Teaching Others How to Use One
